title: Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny (GOG)
description:
Includes the full game along with all the GOG.com game goodies.

Install instructions:
1. Run "setup_realms_of_arkania_2.1.0.27"
2. Play
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny Classic
Genre: RPG
Developer: attic Entertainment Software GmbH 
Publisher: United Independent Entertainment GmbH	
Store page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/267670/

About:
Blade of Destiny (1992) is the first part of the glorious Realms of Arkania Trilogy... 
An Orc army stands ready to attack Arkania's villages and towns.
The only hope of saving the land lies in the legendary Blade of Destiny.
Can you find this magical weapon in time to stop the siege?
A rich and detailed adventure that will engage your mind and challenge your imaginations.

System requirements:
MINIMUM: 
OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 
Processor: 1 GHz Processor 
Memory: 256 MB RAM 
Graphics: 3D graphics card 
DirectX: Version 7.0 
Hard Drive: 30 MB available space
